summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 39, J. H. Nagle's 1st Addition, being the alley between 13th Avenue and 14th Avenue, from East Howell Street to East Denny Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9764 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
